name: FORGETS
description: FORGETS is the final modular cubic syntax crystal experiment of this book. For years I've known of my family's tragically intimate relationship with dementia and Alzheimer's disease and its implications towards my future self's potential perils. Part of the reason why I'm writing this book this is to document my life and its moments, so that I never forget who I am and what I do. I might not remember as well as I used to, but I have never forgotten anything...yet.
